item.description:
yes, it's another chicken slacks meetup, this time at ralph's rock diner in scenic worcester. if you're one of our central massachusetts members or you're up for a road trip, this will be a great night.

the chicken slacks have been lighting up central mass on the last friday of every month with their 'funky fridays' residency at ralph's rock diner in worcester. their most recent ralph's show, on 28 august, was just incredible.

brother wayne was spinning classic soul, funk, and r&b between sets and, as an added attraction, burlesque dancers Miss Honey Pot and Miss Honey Suckle Duvet also entertained the crowd.

it was a memorable evening.

this coming friday, brother wayne will be spinning again and the chicken slacks are sure to have more great surprise guests!

and, oh yeah -- the slacks are pretty damned good, too.

directions to ralph's: http://www.ralphsrock...
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 25 September, 7 p.m.
item.name: Road Trip! Funky Fridays: The Chicken Slacks @ Ralph's Rock Diner in Worcester
